value.title: Automatically alert your data source owners to update their sources
value.excerpt: Are your data source owners updating their sources or do you get blanks everywhere on your reports? In today's video, I am going to show you, how you can automate alerts that send emails to data source owners so they remember to update them. value.title: Bulk import data from multiple pages on a website with Power BI Desktop - Power BI Tips & Tricks #04
value.excerpt: Have you come across a website that has data you need but it is presented in multiple pages? Downloading page by page can be frustrating and time consuming. In this short video, I will show you how to iterate multiple pages on a website to import the data using Power BI.  LINK to NFL site: http://www.nfl.com/stats/categorystats?tabSeq=2&offensiveStatisticCategory=TEAM_PASSING&conference=ALL&role=TM&season=2015&seasonType=REG

value.title: DAX Fridays! #105: ISINSCOPE
value.excerpt: The DAX function ISINSCOPE, allow us to work with hierarchies in Power BI. In this video I will go through an example on how to do that. This DAX function was introduced in the November 2018 Power BI Desktop Update, so make sure you have that installed if you wan to test it out.  Other resources:  DAX

value.title: DAX Fridays! #183: How to deal with multiple dates in Power BI

value.title: DAX Fridays! #30: SEARCH vs FIND
value.excerpt: In today's DAX Fridays! tutorial we are going to go though examples on how to use two DAX functions: SEARCH and FIND  SEARCH and FIND DAX functions are used to find the number of characters at which a specific word is found in a column. value.title: DAX Fridays! #40: DATESINPERIOD (Moving x Months average)

value.title: DAX Fridays! #66: TREATAS
value.excerpt: In this video we will go through the DAX function TREATAS.  The TREATAS DAX function allows us to create virtual relationships within tables or pass filters to tables that are not related.  Link to function in glossary:  https://curbal.com/blog/glossary/treatas-dax   Link to SQLBI blog post: https://www.sqlbi.com/articles/propagate-filters-using-treatas-in-dax/

One example of when this is needed is when you are working with subscription based services. If you want to calculate how many dates go between users changing subscriptions, this DAX measure will help you.  To
